parameters.name: Comment
parameters.description: The new description of the user group. The description can be up to 500 characters in length.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the bastion host in which you want to modify the information about the user group.

> You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the ID of the bastion host.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the bastion host in which you want to modify the information about the user group.

> For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).

parameters.name: UserGroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the user group that you want to modify.

> You can call the [ListUserGroups](~~204509~~) operation to query the ID of the user group.

parameters.name: UserGroupName
parameters.description: The new name of the user group. This name can be up to 128 characters in length.
